title: Type as Image
content: Which books do you know which treat type as an image ?
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Tomato's [Mmm... Skyscraper I Love You: A Typographic Journal of New York](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015815/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/1873968582/ref=ase_typophile-20/103-0960363-2895022?v=glance&s=books)  
is a prime contemporary example.
